Leonora Okine (amụrụ na Julaị 11, 1981) bụ onye Ghana na-eme ihe nkiri, onye ọrụ ebere na onye na-ahụ maka nhazi azụmahịa.
A mụrụ Leonora na Accra, Ghana
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ n'oge ọ bụ nwata na Bishop Joel Primary na JHS

Ọ bụ onye gụsịrị akwụkwọ na St Mary's Senior High School, Accra, ebe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ sekọndrị ya.
Ọ gụrụ Biological Science na Mahadum Ghana, Legon, ọ gara n'ihu na Accra Business School ebe ọ nwetara MBA na Project Management
N'afọ 2007, ọ gara n'ihu iji mụọ Operations and Project Management na Ghana Institute of Management and Public Administration.

Ọrụ ime ihe nkiri nke Leonora malitere site na mpụta ọbịa na usoro telivishọn Ghana, Different Shades of Blue (2007).
N'afọ 2012 ọ nọchiri Matilda Obaseki na ihe nrite TV nke Naijiria, Tinsel (ihe nkiri TV), na-arụ ọrụ dịka Angela Dede.
Ọ gosiri dika "Malaika" na ihe omume asaa nke usoro ihe nkiri MTV, Shuga
O meela ihe nkiri na Marrying the Game, Kpians: The Feast of Souls, Love and War, In Line, Beautiful Monster, na Desperation.
Onye na-eme ihe nkiri kacha mma na TV Series category, Golden Movie Award Africa (GMAA), 2015.
